name: Tork VR Clean Hands Training for Care Homes
summary: Proper hand hygiene is considered the single most important method of preventing and controlling infections in long term care facilities. The Tork VR Clean Hands Training offers a hands-on training for care home staff to improve their hand hygiene compliance according to WHO's moments of hand hygiene. In addition, you will learn the correct hand hygiene technique. Putting on the VR headset, you get ready to start a new shift. Although you are in a virtual world, you’ll face a series of real-life...
